mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM NO, A.* FROM ( SELECT SUM( DECODE(NODE_ID,'201610260001' ,1,0)) AS COW1 , SUM( DECODE(NODE_ID,'201610260002' ,1,0)) AS COW2 , SUM( DECODE(NODE_ID,'201610260003' ,1,0)) AS COW3 , SUM( DECODE(NODE_ID,'201610260004' ,1,0)) AS COW4 , SUM( DECODE(NODE_ID,'201610260005' ,1,0)) AS COW5 , SUM( DECODE(NODE_ID,'201610260006' ,1,0)) AS COW6 , SUM( DECODE(NODE_ID,'201610260007' ,1,0)) AS COW7 , SUM( DECODE(NODE_ID,'201610260008' ,1,0)) AS COW8 , SUM( DECODE(NODE_ID,'201610260009' ,1,0)) AS COW9 , SUM( DECODE(NODE_ID,'201610260010' ,1,0)) AS COW10 , TO_CHAR(DTIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as CDTIME, DEV_TYPE FROM TURBOSOFT.SENSE where DEV_TYPE='1' and ACTION_VALUE >= 1 GROUP BY TO_CHAR(DTIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD'),DEV_TYPE order by TO_CHAR(DTIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD') desc)a)

select cu_id as SENSECUID , node_id as SENSENODEID , DEV_TYPE as SENSEDEVTIPE , min(DTIME) as TEMDATE1 , max(DTIME) as TEMDATE2 , count(*) as TEMC , ROUND(AVG(ACTION_VALUE),3) as TEMAVR , ROUND(STDDEV(ACTION_VALUE),3) as TEMS , min(ACTION_VALUE) as TEMMIN , max(ACTION_VALUE) as TEMMAX
from TURBOSOFT.SENSE GROUP BY cu_id,node_id,DEV_TYPE ORDER BY node_id

select node_id as SENSENODEID , min(dtime) as UPFIRST , max(dtime) as UPLAST , count(*) as COT , round(avg(co2) ,3) as CO2AVR , round(stddev(co2), 3) as CO2STD , min(co2) as CO2MIN , max(co2) as CO2MAX , round(avg(temp) , 3) as TEMAVR , round(stddev(temp), 3) as TEMSTD , min(temp) as TEMMIN , max(temp) as TEMMAX , round(avg(hum) ,3) as HUMAVR , round(stddev(hum) , 3) as HUMSTD , min(hum) as HUMMIN , max(hum) as HUMMAX from TURBOSOFT.SENSE_ENV GROUP BY node_id order by NODE_ID
select * from( select ACTION_VALUE as ACTIONVALUE, DEV_TYPE as DEVTYPE, DTIME from TURBOSOFT.SENSE where NODE_ID = #{NODEID} ORDER BY DTIME desc)
select * from( select CO2, TEMP, HUM, DTIME from TURBOSOFT.SENSE_env where NODE_ID = #{NODEID} ORDER BY DTIME desc)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO rda_test.MEDICALHISTORY( SEQNO, ENTITY_ID, CURE_DATE, OCCUR_DATE, DISEASE, PRESCRIBE, RECOVERY_DATE, INPUTDATE ) VALUES( rda_test.SEQ_MEDICALHISTORY.nextval , #{ENTITY_ID} , #{CURE_DATE}, #{OCCUR_DATE}, #{DISEASE}, #{PRESCRIBE}, #{RECOVERY_DATE}, to_date(SYSDATE, 'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') )
mapper.select: select to_char(to_date(DTIME,'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yy.mm.dd') from TURBOSOFT.SENSE where node_id = '201610260009' GROUP BY to_char(to_date(DTIME,'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yy.mm.dd') HAVING min(ACTION_VALUE)> = 0 and max(ACTION_VALUE) > 0ORDER BY to_char(to_date(DTIME,'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yy.mm.dd') asc

select '['||min(ACTION_VALUE)||','||max(ACTION_VALUE)||']' from TURBOSOFT.SENSE where node_id = '201610260009' GROUP BY to_char(to_date(DTIME,'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yy.mm.dd') HAVING min(ACTION_VALUE)> = 0 and max(ACTION_VALUE)> 0 ORDER BY to_char(to_date(DTIME,'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yy.mm.dd') asc

select ROUND(AVG(ACTION_VALUE),3) from TURBOSOFT.SENSE where node_id = '201610260008' and ACTION_VALUE >=1 GROUP BY to_char(to_date(DTIME,'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yy.mm.dd') ORDER BY to_char(to_date(DTIME,'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yy.mm.dd') asc

select ROUND(MEDIAN(ACTION_VALUE),3) from TURBOSOFT.SENSE where node_id = '201610260008' and ACTION_VALUE >=1 GROUP BY to_char(to_date(DTIME,'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yy.mm.dd') ORDER BY to_char(to_date(DTIME,'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yy.mm.dd') asc

select to_char(to_date(DTIME,'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yy.mm.dd') from TURBOSOFT.SENSE_ENV GROUP BY node_id,to_char(to_date(DTIME,'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yy.mm.dd') ORDER BY to_char(to_date(DTIME,'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yy.mm.dd') asc
select ROUND(AVG(TEMP),3) from TURBOSOFT.SENSE_ENV GROUP BY node_id,to_char(to_date(DTIME,'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yy.mm.dd') ORDER BY to_char(to_date(DTIME,'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yy.mm.dd') asc
select ROUND(AVG(CO2),3) from TURBOSOFT.SENSE_ENV GROUP BY node_id,to_char(to_date(DTIME,'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yy.mm.dd') ORDER BY to_char(to_date(DTIME,'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yy.mm.dd') asc
select ROUND(AVG(HUM),3) from TURBOSOFT.SENSE_ENV GROUP BY node_id,to_char(to_date(DTIME,'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yy.mm.dd') ORDER BY to_char(to_date(DTIME,'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yy.mm.dd') asc
SELECT * FROM GIKIMI_T WHERE G_DATE LIKE '17/09/'||'%' ORDER BY G_DATE DESC
